ingredients.ingredient: 1 large butternut squash, halved lengthwise and seeded
2 tablespoons butter, or more to taste
6 cups chicken stock, or more as desired, divided
3 Granny Smith apples, cored and chopped

cookingTips: Roast squash halves cut-side down at 400Â°F for 40 minutes until tender before scooping flesh
Add apple near end of cooking to maintain some texture and prevent overcooking
Use immersion blender for silky smooth texture or leave slightly chunky per preference
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a seasonal soup combining sweet squash and tart apple. Guide on proper squash roasting and how apple acidity balances the richness.
